import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import {ApiService } from'../api.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-users-management', templateUrl: './users-management.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users-management.component.css'] }) export class UsersManagementComponent implements OnInit { users: any[] = []; constructor(private apiService: ApiService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getUsers(); } getUsers(): void { this.apiService.getUsers().subscribe((data) => { this.users = data; }); } }
